description:
Second-in-command of the Akatsuki yakuza group. He has a sweet tooth.
He is a character in the We are the Tsukiyono Company (Kochira Tsukiyono Company こちら月夜野♡カンパニ〜) television show that http://anidb.net/ch120646 [Kitagawa Marin] introduced to http://anidb.net/ch120645 [Gojou Wakana].
name: Wakagashira
